ca.projectTOMi.tomi.service

Class ProjectService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.projectTOMi.tomi.service.ProjectService

  • @Service
public final class ProjectService
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides services for Project objects.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Karol Talbot
